EasyQuest.Name: Of Forgotten Memories
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return ObjectManager.GetObjectWoWUnit().Any(u => u.Entry == 11886 && u.IsAlive && u.Position.DistanceTo(new Vector3(1571.63f, -3276f, 88.88f)) < 40);

EasyQuest.Name: A Plague Upon Thee pt2
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return ObjectManager.GetObjectWoWUnit().Any(u => u.Entry == 177491 && u.IsAlive && u.Position.DistanceTo(new Vector3(1571.63f, -3276f, 88.88f)) < 40);
